column5: happy turkey day to my canadian friends
Happy thanksgiving!!!!!  no turkey for us this year.....just put a pork shoulder in the smoker..will be ready in about 7 hrs.... first time trying this, hope it turns out!!

Turkey's stuffed and just gone in the oven. Gonna smell like a little piece of heaven around here in no time. Done the fried turkey thing a few times. In my book, nothing beats a roasted turkey with stuffing and all the trimmings.  Happy Thanksgiving.
If the indigenous people had given the Pilgrim's a donkey instead of turkeys, we'd all be getting a piece of ass today! Happy Thanksgiving  everyone! HH
Thank you Doug. You and yours have a great day today as well. Only 45 days 'til your turkey day.
Thanks Dougster!  Have a great non-turkey, maybe cheesburger, steak or pizza day bud!
Happy Thanksgiving to all of my Northern friends. Hopefully the year has been good to you and your families and another good year ahead.   Art
Happy Thanksgiving! I hope everyone enjoys the day  We have a bit of a wait for ours :-(
